mapper.select:
select id as id, software_id as softwareId, software_type as softwareTypeId, update_explain as updateExplain,
software_size as softwareSize, version as version, update_time as updateTime,
from iosaonroid
and id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
select seq_iosaonroid.nextval as sysId from DUAL
insert into iosaonroid( id, software_id, software_type, update_explain,
software_size, version, update_time ) values( #{id}, #{softwareId}, #{softwareTypeId}, #{updateExplain},
#{softwareSize}, #{version}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update:
update iosaonroid
update_explain=#{updateExplain},
software_size=#{softwareSize},
version=#{version},
update_time=#{updateTime},
where software_id=#{softwareId} and software_type=#{softwareTypeId}
